Player History
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/4/1987, off Jesse Orosco (SEA)...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Hit 3 homeruns against Kansas City, driving in 4 runs on 9/8/1987...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1987, hitting .265 with 48 HR, 128 RBI...
Drove in 8 runs against Kansas City on 5/6/1988...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,292,857 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/12/1989, hitting .542 with 5 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1989, hitting .359 with 13 HR, 29 RBI...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Toronto on 7/23/1989...
Hit 3 homeruns against New York (Y), driving in 4 runs on 8/11/1989...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/14/1989, hitting .458 with 7 HR, 10 RBI...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,057,143 through salary arbitration...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1990, hitting .333 with 12 HR, 40 RBI...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
2/2/1991: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,057,143 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/17/1991, hitting .444 with 7 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1991, hitting .301 with 16 HR, 30 RBI...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
11/1/1991: Signed a contract extension with Oakland, $6,000,000 per year, for 4 years.
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1992, hitting .298 with 7 HR, 29 RBI...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/6/1992 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
